page.title: 02Industrial Manufacturing
page.content: Norflex was established in 1972. The factory in Horncastle was established in 1979. There are 3 other factories in Cramlington, Ebbw Vale and Dolstone They make land and road drainage pipes in 7 sizes, 80mm being the most common. The factory employs 31 people and supplies are sent all over the British Isles. There are 2 women in the office. The rest work in the factory in 3 shifts. In fixed assets the equipment is worth around Â£2 million. A roll takes about 5 minutes to make depending upon the size of the piping. 430 rolls a day are made for the 80mm size. The Horncastle building is 15000sq ft. In 1984 the turnover was Â£5 million in all 3 establishments. In each batch of drainage pipes there is no waste.
